ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Ulysses Heliosphere Instrument for Spectral, Composition, and Anisotropy at Low Energies (HISCALE) LEMS30 MFSA, Spacecraft Frame, Sectored Z>1 Ion Fluxes, Hourly Averages
ResourceHeader.Description: Hourly-averaged sectored Z>1 ion fluxes from the MF Spectrum Analyzer of the Ulysses/HISCALE LEMS30 instrument. All energies thresholds take into account the incident particle type, shielding, and inactive dead-layer of the solid state detector. All fluxes are background corrected and are in the spacecraft rest frame.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies, LLC

InformationURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
InformationURL.Description: A table summarizing the contents of HISCALE data available via the SPDF

AccessURL.Name: Ulysses HISCALE Hourly-Averaged
AccessURL.Description: Parent directory containing the Hourly-averaged fluxes for the Ulysses/HISCALE instrument for the entire mission.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies, LLC

Parameter.Name: Time for the record
Parameter.Description: Time for the record given in year, day of year, hour, min, and decimal seconds. The given time represents the beginning of the averaging interval.
